item.title: Are ‘healthy’ sodas actually good for you? What benefits Olipop and Poppi actually have
item.description: What to know about the trendy sodas that tout gut-health benefits.

item.title: Gen Z’s expensive drug habit: More want brand-name meds that are 79% more expensive
item.description: Most Americans would prefer brand-name drugs—but end up buying generic versions because of the cost, new consumer research suggests.

item.title: Dismissed nuclear bomb specialists recalled by Energy Department
item.description: Between 300 and 400 workers at the National Nuclear Safety Administration were terminated.

item.title: Buffett sold more BofA stock while keeping Apple stake intact
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in the bank to 8.9% in the fourth quarter after selling 117.5 million shares.

item.title: ‘OpenAI is not for sale’: Elon Musk’s $97.4 billion bid is unanimously rejected by board
item.description: OpenAI said its board "has unanimously rejected Mr. Musk’s latest attempt to disrupt his competition."
